Params: {1: 'Firn Night', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Near the reserve operation area of Babylonia, several squads are busy carrying supplies and weapons.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like there's an emergency mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Everyone's on edge. Hopefully, the mission isn't too serious.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't worry, they've got skilled combatants with them. Though, back on our case, Commandant, we still have a round of data collection for Lucia's frame coming up, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yeah.', 3: '8', 4: 'Data collection?', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I wonder how we'll go about the data collection.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...It'll be nice if we can figure out why my frame isn't operating at its full capacity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant... You saw the transmission, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Because the actual performance of Lucia's new frame wasn't quite up to par, the higher-ups want us to participate in a series of data collection to see what's wrong.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's what the data collection is about, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Gray Raven. Good to see you here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, an unexpected figure walks out of the bustling squads. Her expression is ice-cold—just like when you first met in the Arctic.'}
{2: 'Rosetta?', 3: '15', 4: 'Do you need us for anything?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Why the surprised expression...? Well, I guess it is my first time speaking to you in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "You're just as calm as ever, but at least that's reassuring.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Nikola, Gray Raven's commandant can take the last spot. Report over and out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She seems to have been connected to Commander Nikola all this time. You feel a hint of what she is saying, but you are unsure as to why she did so.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Rosetta, I know you must have a mission, but we need to collect data. I don't think we'd be able to help you out...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's okay. It won't affect you. I'm just missing a commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'ARU seems to be under attack and has requested reinforcements. I need to bring troops over from Babylonia ASAP.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is it the Ascendants?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I can't say for sure... But I need to borrow your commandant and get back to the ARU. There's no time to spare.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But, going there with just Commandant...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I won't let your commandant come to any harm. You have my word.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If that's the case... What do you think, Commandant?", 4: '2'}
{2: "I'll go to the ARU.", 3: '30', 4: "I don't think HQ will give me a choice.", 5: '3000'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If you say so, Commandant. Rosetta, please keep Commandant safe.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm sorry, but there is no way. Rest assured, I will keep you safe.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{3: 'You hear fighting nearby, sending a chill down your spine.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I won't let you get any closer!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Holding a spear, Rosetta confronts the group of hostile bionic machines. They continue their reckless assault heedlessly.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Great. You're awake.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the situation now?", 3: '39', 4: 'Are you okay?', 5: '40'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's up in the air... Or actually, I think it's bordering a bit on the bad side. I wasn't expecting to run into these bionics this quickly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I think you should be more concerned about yourself. You've been asleep in the snow for over half an hour.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Anyway, it's about over. I'm going to charge ahead!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta throws her spear, penetrating the enemies like a shooting star. While the enemies are distracted, she jumps into the air and unleashes her shield.'}
{3: 'A burst of energy erupts from her shield and rains down on the enemy bionics.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: '—Retreat!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The bionics at the rear make a split decision to abandon their fallen comrades and retreat out of the battlefield.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Hmph... Just my lucky day.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Once Rosetta confirms the enemy's retreat, she lowers the output of her light wings and descends from the sky, retrieving her spear impaled in the ground."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Alright, 【kuroname】. Let's continue our mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Our mission?', 3: '51', 4: 'What is this place?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '...Are you messing with me? Or do you not care to remember these sorts of things?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "We are within Arctic Route Union's jurisdiction. Did the impact just now give you brain damage or something...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'At any rate—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I didn't expect the transport craft to be shot down by anti-aircraft guns and crash into the snow... Just my lucky day...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as you are about to inquire about the next course of action, a group of bionics suddenly charge out from where they evacuated. Looks like they were retreating to rally reinforcements.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Looks like now's not the time to talk... 【kuroname】, no... Commandant, join me in battle!", 4: '1'}
